17 string get_dof_name (const SpatialVector &joint_dof) {
18  if (joint_dof == SpatialVector (1., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0.))
19  return "RX";
20  else if (joint_dof == SpatialVector (0., 1., 0., 0., 0., 0.))
21  return "RY";
22  else if (joint_dof == SpatialVector (0., 0., 1., 0., 0., 0.))
23  return "RZ";
24  else if (joint_dof == SpatialVector (0., 0., 0., 1., 0., 0.))
25  return "TX";
26  else if (joint_dof == SpatialVector (0., 0., 0., 0., 1., 0.))
27  return "TY";
28  else if (joint_dof == SpatialVector (0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 1.))
29  return "TZ";
30 
31  ostringstream dof_stream(ostringstream::out);
32  dof_stream << "custom (" << joint_dof.transpose() << ")";
33  return dof_stream.str();
34 }
35 
36 string get_body_name (const RigidBodyDynamics::Model &model, unsigned int body_id) {
37  if (model.mBodies[body_id].mIsVirtual) {
38  // if there is not a unique child we do not know what to do...
39  if (model.mu[body_id].size() != 1)
40  return "";
41 
42  return get_body_name (model, model.mu[body_id][0]);
43  }
44 
45  return model.GetBodyName(body_id);
46 }
47 
48 RBDL_DLLAPI std::string GetModelDOFOverview (const Model &model) {
49  stringstream result ("");
50 
51  unsigned int q_index = 0;
52  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < model.mBodies.size(); i++) {
53  if (model.mJoints[i].mDoFCount == 1) {
54  result << setfill(' ') << setw(3) << q_index << ": " << get_body_name(model, i) << "_" << get_dof_name (model.S[i]) << endl;
55  q_index++;
56  } else {
57  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < model.mJoints[i].mDoFCount; j++) {
58  result << setfill(' ') << setw(3) << q_index << ": " << get_body_name(model, i) << "_" << get_dof_name (model.mJoints[i].mJointAxes[j]) << endl;
59  q_index++;
60  }
61  }
62  }
63 
64  return result.str();
65 }
66 
67 std::string print_hierarchy (const RigidBodyDynamics::Model &model, unsigned int body_index = 0, int indent = 0) {
68  stringstream result ("");
69 
70  for (int j = 0; j < indent; j++)
71  result << " ";
72 
73  result << get_body_name (model, body_index);
74 
75  if (body_index > 0)
76  result << " [ ";
77 
78  while (model.mBodies[body_index].mIsVirtual) {
79  if (model.mu[body_index].size() == 0) {
80  result << " end";
81  break;
82  } else if (model.mu[body_index].size() > 1) {
83  cerr << endl << "Error: Cannot determine multi-dof joint as massless body with id " << body_index << " (name: " << model.GetBodyName(body_index) << ") has more than one child:" << endl;
84  for (unsigned int ci = 0; ci < model.mu[body_index].size(); ci++) {
85  cerr << " id: " << model.mu[body_index][ci] << " name: " << model.GetBodyName(model.mu[body_index][ci]) << endl;
86  }
87  abort();
88  }
89 
90  result << get_dof_name(model.S[body_index]) << ", ";
91 
92  body_index = model.mu[body_index][0];
93  }
94 
95  if (body_index > 0)
96  result << get_dof_name(model.S[body_index]) << " ]";
97  result << endl;
98 
99  unsigned int child_index = 0;
100  for (child_index = 0; child_index < model.mu[body_index].size(); child_index++) {
101  result << print_hierarchy (model, model.mu[body_index][child_index], indent + 1);
102  }
103 
104  // print fixed children
105  for (unsigned int fbody_index = 0; fbody_index < model.mFixedBodies.size(); fbody_index++) {
106  if (model.mFixedBodies[fbody_index].mMovableParent == body_index) {
107  for (int j = 0; j < indent + 1; j++)
108  result << " ";
109 
110  result << model.GetBodyName(model.fixed_body_discriminator + fbody_index) << " [fixed]" << endl;
111  }
112  }
113 
114 
115  return result.str();
116 }
117 
118 RBDL_DLLAPI std::string GetModelHierarchy (const Model &model) {
119  stringstream result ("");
120 
121  result << print_hierarchy (model);
122 
123  return result.str();
124 }

126 RBDL_DLLAPI std::string GetNamedBodyOriginsOverview (Model &model) {
127  stringstream result ("");
128 
129  VectorNd Q (VectorNd::Zero(model.dof_count));
130  UpdateKinematicsCustom (model, &Q, NULL, NULL);
131 
132  for (unsigned int body_id = 0; body_id < model.mBodies.size(); body_id++) {
133  std::string body_name = model.GetBodyName (body_id);
134 
135  if (body_name.size() == 0)
136  continue;
137 
138  Vector3d position = CalcBodyToBaseCoordinates (model, Q, body_id, Vector3d (0., 0., 0.), false);
139 
140  result << body_name << ": " << position.transpose() << endl;
141  }
142 
143  return result.str();
144 }
145 
146 RBDL_DLLAPI void CalcCenterOfMass (
147  Model &model,
148  const Math::VectorNd &q,
149  const Math::VectorNd &qdot,
150  double &mass,
151  Math::Vector3d &com,
152  Math::Vector3d *com_velocity,
153  Vector3d *angular_momentum,
154  bool update_kinematics) {
155  if (update_kinematics)
156  UpdateKinematicsCustom (model, &q, &qdot, NULL);
157 
158  for (size_t i = 1; i < model.mBodies.size(); i++) {
159  model.Ic[i] = model.I[i];
160  model.hc[i] = model.Ic[i].toMatrix() * model.v[i];
161  }
162 
163  SpatialRigidBodyInertia Itot (0., Vector3d (0., 0., 0.), Matrix3d::Zero(3,3));
164  SpatialVector htot (SpatialVector::Zero(6));
165 
166  for (size_t i = model.mBodies.size() - 1; i > 0; i--) {
167  unsigned int lambda = model.lambda[i];
168 
169  if (lambda != 0) {
170  model.Ic[lambda] = model.Ic[lambda] + model.X_lambda[i].applyTranspose (model.Ic[i]);
171  model.hc[lambda] = model.hc[lambda] + model.X_lambda[i].applyTranspose (model.hc[i]);
172  } else {
173  Itot = Itot + model.X_lambda[i].applyTranspose (model.Ic[i]);
174  htot = htot + model.X_lambda[i].applyTranspose (model.hc[i]);
175  }
176  }
177 
178  mass = Itot.m;
179  com = Itot.h / mass;
180  LOG << "mass = " << mass << " com = " << com.transpose() << " htot = " << htot.transpose() << std::endl;
181 
182  if (com_velocity)
183  *com_velocity = Vector3d (htot[3] / mass, htot[4] / mass, htot[5] / mass);
184 
185  if (angular_momentum) {
186  htot = Xtrans (com).applyAdjoint (htot);
187  angular_momentum->set (htot[0], htot[1], htot[2]);
188  }
189 }
190 
191 RBDL_DLLAPI double CalcPotentialEnergy (
192  Model &model,
193  const Math::VectorNd &q,
194  bool update_kinematics) {
195  double mass;
196  Vector3d com;
197  CalcCenterOfMass (model, q, VectorNd::Zero (model.qdot_size), mass, com, NULL, NULL, update_kinematics);
198 
199  Vector3d g = - Vector3d (model.gravity[0], model.gravity[1], model.gravity[2]);
200  LOG << "pot_energy: " << " mass = " << mass << " com = " << com.transpose() << std::endl;
201 
202  return mass * com.dot(g);
203 }
204 
205 RBDL_DLLAPI double CalcKineticEnergy (
206  Model &model,
207  const Math::VectorNd &q,
208  const Math::VectorNd &qdot,
209  bool update_kinematics) {
210  if (update_kinematics)
211  UpdateKinematicsCustom (model, &q, &qdot, NULL);
212 
213  double result = 0.;
214 
215  for (size_t i = 1; i < model.mBodies.size(); i++) {
216  result += 0.5 * model.v[i].transpose() * (model.I[i] * model.v[i]);
217  }
218  return result;
219 }
220 
221 }
222 }
